name: Forester's Dye
flavorText: The Wardens of Duncraig wear coats of rich green velvet while patrolling the woods for poachers and wolves.
flavorTextHtml: The Wardens of Duncraig wear coats of rich green velvet while patrolling the woods for poachers and wolves.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
